Method Detail

associate

XBorder associate(XAddress source,
                  XBorder.Transform transform,
                  XAddress target)
Associates the given source and transform to the given target.

Parameters:
source - the source to be associated
transform - the transform to be associated
target - the target to be associated
Returns:
this border

getData

java.util.Map<XId,java.util.Map<XAddress,java.lang.Object>> getData(XComponent<?> targetComponent)
Returns data for parts in the identified component.

This method returns a map, in which each entry associates a map that associates a target id with a map from a source address to the data from that part.

Parameters:
targetComponent - the component for which data should be returned
Returns:
data for the identified target
